views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8, 9, 10 and 11

Wake it up.
An iOS tweak brings "Raise" to wake to unsupported devices.
After installing, the tweak will help you can configure it and learn from you.
Raise your phone to wake it up, and put down to make it sleep. :-)

Wake It Up.
一个让旧设备实现抬手唤醒的插件。
在安装完成后，插件会帮助你进行软件设置，并学习你的使用习惯。
在抬手唤醒后，您可以放下设备，它便会自动锁屏。

Enjoy it~~~

Configure options from Settings.

Fixed some problems about system sleep. Support iOS 11 now!
Fix some problems when you pick up the phone.
More smooth.
Add support for iOS 8 and 9. Now you can change the time interval between each scan.

If you have Touchr installed, please remove Touchr when first configuring Wake It Up, after configuring you can install Touchr to the devices again.

iOS 8, 9 and 11 will be supported soon.
